name: Internal Medicine
desc: Internal medicine or general internal medicine is the medical specialty dealing with the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of internal diseases. Physicians specializing in internal medicine are called internists, or physicians in Commonwealth nations.

name: 3 Day 2 Night Dhaka to Cox's Bazar Tour with Air Ticket
desc: Dhaka - Cox's Bazar 3 days 2 nights travel package. Package includes Dhaka – Cox’s Bazar – Dhaka by Air tickets. 2 nights twin accommodation at the hotel. A breakfast facility will be provided at the hotel.

name: Sundarban Tour Package from Khulna
desc: Khulna-Sundarban-Khulna 2 night 3 days travel package. Lets see what's service will provide you - Two well trained forest guards from Govt.of forest department are engaged for safety. Experienced Sundarban tourist guide for all time directions..
